channel.title: About the 481 server
channel.description:
i get a problem like this [code]Expection in thread "thread-1" java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: opcode 49
at org.rs2d.clienthandler.run(clienthandler.java:207) at java.lang.thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] :confused:

item.title: About the 481 server
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:3, topic:205908”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=271638.msg2229291#msg2229291 date=1211054931]

i get a problem like this

[code]Expection in thread “thread-1” java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: opcode 49

at org.rs2d.clienthandler.run(clienthandler.java:207)
at java.lang.thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

The exception makes perfect sense. Now why don’t you do into clienthandler.java and implement opcode 49 yourself, rather than making idiotic threads about it.
[/quote]
Idiotic people idiotic threads, maybe he escaped from mopar… we need to tighten the locks[/quote]oh the irony

Read full topic
